description:
- Fluffy Bunny Hat "A hat with a fluffy toy rabbit design."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop( Fashion Store in Castle St. ) when you purchase it.
 - Boa Coat: Beige "Fashionable warm coat with a fuzzy woolen lining."
 - Kid's Boa Coat: Beige "Fashionable, warm kid's coat with a fuzzy woolen lining."
 *You can buy it at any time in the game shop( Clothing Store in Castle St. ) when you purchase it.
name: Boa Coat Set: Beige
